mulan.regressor.transformation

Class RandomLinearCombinations

  • java.lang.Object
    • mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearnerBase
      • mulan.regressor.transformation.TransformationBasedMultiTargetRegressor
        • mulan.regressor.transformation.RandomLinearCombinations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, MultiLabelLearner, TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class RandomLinearCombinations
extends TransformationBasedMultiTargetRegressor

    Implementation of the multi-target regression method presented in Grigorios Tsoumakas, Eleftherios Spyromitros-Xioufis, Aikaterini Vrekou, Ioannis Vlahavas. 2014. Multi-Target Regression via Random Linear Target Combinations. arXiv e-prints

    Version:
    2014.03.31
    Author:
    Grigorios Tsoumakas, Aikaterini Vrekou, Eleftherios Spyromitros-Xioufis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Learner specific implementation of building the model from MultiLabelInstances training data set.

      Returns a string representation of the single-target regression model build for the target with this targetIndex.

      This function is used to speed-up experiments with different number of models, which we built only once, but test multiple times.

    • Method Detail

      • getPredictionOfModel

        public double getPredictionOfModel(Instance instance,
                                   int model)
        This function is used to speed-up experiments with different number of models, which we built only once, but test multiple times.
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance to predict
        model - the model to use
        Returns:
        prediction of model on instance

      • buildInternal

        protected void buildInternal(MultiLabelInstances train)
                      throws Exception
        Description copied from class: MultiLabelLearnerBase
        Learner specific implementation of building the model from MultiLabelInstances training data set. This method is called from MultiLabelLearnerBase.build(MultiLabelInstances) method, where behavior common across all learners is applied.
        Specified by:
        buildInternal in class MultiLabelLearnerBase
        Parameters:
        train - the training data set
        Throws:
        Exception - if learner model was not created successfully

      • setNumModels

        public void setNumModels(int numModels)
        Sets the number of models to use during prediction
        Parameters:

      • makePredictionInternal

        protected MultiLabelOutput makePredictionInternal(Instance instance)
                                           throws Exception,
                                                  InvalidDataException
        Description copied from class: MultiLabelLearnerBase
        Learner specific implementation for predicting on specified data based on trained model. This method is called from MultiLabelLearnerBase.makePrediction(weka.core.Instance) which guards for model initialization and apply common handling/behavior.
        Specified by:
        makePredictionInternal in class MultiLabelLearnerBase
        Parameters:
        instance - the data instance to predict on
        Returns:
        the output of the learner for the given instance
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs while making the prediction.
        InvalidDataException - if specified instance data is invalid and can not be processed by the learner
